org.openimaj.image.model.patch

Class MBFPatchClassificationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.model.patch.PatchClassificationModel<Float[],MBFImage>
      • org.openimaj.image.model.patch.MBFPatchClassificationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, ImageClassificationModel<MBFImage>, EstimatableModel<MBFImage,FImage>, Model<MBFImage,FImage>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HistogramPatchModel

    public abstract class MBFPatchClassificationModel
extends PatchClassificationModel<Float[],MBFImage>
    A base implementation of a PatchClassificationModel for MBFImages.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:

        protected int ndims

    • Constructor Detail

      • MBFPatchClassificationModel

        public MBFPatchClassificationModel(int ndims,
                           int patchWidth,
                           int patchHeight)
        Construct the model with the specified dimensionality and patch size. The dimensionality should probably equal the number of bands in the MBFImages that the model is applied to.
        Parameters:
        ndims - the number of dimensions.
        patchWidth - The width of each patch.
        patchHeight - The height of each patch.
